'''Steel''' is a [[metal]] that has been referenced multiple times early on in the [[Minecraft]]'s development. [[Notch]] had stated that it could be made using [[coal]] and [[iron ore]],<ref>{{citation|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20210603201943/https://notch.tumblr.com/post/110762705/my-list-on-tile-types-so-far|title=My list on tile types so far|website=Tumblr|author=Notch|date=May 21, 2009}}</ref> and that it could be used for armor and weapons more powerful than iron.<ref>{{citation|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20210429224451/https://notch.tumblr.com/post/123343045/my-vision-for-survival|title=My vision for survival|website=Tumblr|author=Notch|date=June 14, 2009}}</ref> In-game, [[flint and steel]] is crafted using iron ingots, considering the lack of steel and the need of a “fire striker”, despite the name of the former.
